name: Chanel N°5 Eau de Parfum
description: The world's most famous fragrance, a timeless classic with notes of rose, jasmine, and vanilla.

name: NARS Blush "Orgasm"
description: Iconic peachy-pink blush with golden shimmer that flatters all skin tones.

name: MAC Retro Matte Lipstick "Ruby Woo"
description: Legendary retro matte lipstick in a universally flattering blue-red shade.

name: Estée Lauder Advanced Night Repair Serum
description: Revolutionary nighttime serum that repairs damage and prevents future signs of aging.

name: SK-II Facial Treatment Essence
description: Cult-favorite essence with Pitera that transforms skin texture and radiance.

name: La Mer Crème de la Mer
description: Luxury moisturizing cream with Miracle Broth that deeply hydrates and soothes skin.

name: Bioderma Sensibio H2O Micellar Water
description: Gentle micellar water that removes makeup and impurities without irritation.

name: Maybelline Great Lash Mascara
description: Iconic drugstore mascara that defines and lengthens lashes with its classic formula.

name: Beautyblender Original Sponge

name: Shu Uemura Eyelash Curler
description: Professional eyelash curler that lifts and curls lashes for a wide-eyed, doll-like look.
